text:
After A Power-Packed Jonas Brothers Performance, Joe Ties The Knot With Sophie Turner In Vegas!
After A Power-Packed Jonas Brothers Performance, Joe Ties The Knot With Sophie Turner In Vegas!
Game Of Thrones Star Sophie Turner surprised her fans after she tied the knot with her long time boyfriend Joe Jonas. In an impromptu ceremony, the actress exchanged wedding vows in Las Vegas. As per Eonline, it is confirmed that Joe and Sophie are officially husband and wife after obtaining a marriage license on Wednesday, May 1.
The snoopy internet caught hold of the photos and videos after DJ Diplo began posting footage from the ceremony. Take a look at the videos and photos.
Don't Miss 365 SHARES 159 SHARES
Turner can be seen walking down the aisle in a stunning white bridal ensemble and veil. The couple announced their engagement in October 2017 after more than a year together.
As per reports, Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas also attended the ceremony in the sin-city. Looking at the small gathering, it's easy to tell, the function was nothing like PC's grand marriage back in India.
Prior to this, the Jonas brothers performed at the Billboard Music awards to their popular song Sucker. In fact, they grooved at the award show for the first time after 2009.
2019 is clearly the year of weddings and good luck. Congratulations Mr. Joe and Mrs Sophie Jonas.
